function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relying on extrapolation of classic infection-control and public health measures","Impact":"Ineffective containment of the COVID-19 pandemic","Mitigation":"Develop and implement new strategies specific to the characteristics of COVID-19","Technologies":"IoT, big-data analytics, AI, blockchain","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of extreme quarantine measures and detailed contact tracing for the scale of COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to contain the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Develop and implement new digital surveillance and detection systems","Technologies":"IoT, big-data analytics, AI, blockchain","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Potential ineffectiveness of traditional public-health strategies for tackling COVID-19","Impact":"Inadequate response to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Integration of digital technologies in public-health strategies","Technologies":"IoT, big-data analytics, AI, blockchain","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"}]}
